relevant_findings.general: Elderly man, very thin, good color
relevant_findings.eyes: extra-ocular movements intact, pupils equal round, reactive to light, sclera anicteric, notable ocular hollowing
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1, S2
relevant_findings.respiratory: Tracheostomy in place, capped, mild ronchi on auscultation
relevant_findings.abdomen: Well healed midline incision, distended, diffuse tenderness
